text: Valerie McGovern was an Irish radio and television broadcaster. She worked as a continuity announcer, and read the news on RTÉ Television starting in 1977.Valerie McGovern RTÉ Stills Library. McGovern presented the programme Summer Lookaround with Bunny Carr on RTÉ TV. The weekly magazine programme, Summer Scene was presented by McGovern, along with Joe Mac Anthony. She was the television commentator of the 1970 Eurovision Song Contest, which Ireland won, for RTÉ.Ireland at Eurovision ==References== Category:Irish radio presenters Category:Irish television presenters Category:Irish women journalists Category:RTÉ Radio presenters Category:RTÉ television presenters Category:Women radio presenters Category:Women television presenters
title: Valerie McGovern
